description: Sundried tomato pesto is the perfect addition to elevate your eggs on toast.
name: Tomato & Red Pesto Egg in A Hole Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g sundried tomatoes, jar, drained, oil reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Add all of the pesto ingredients (except the lemon juice) to a food processor and blend on a low speed. Drizzle half the reserved oil from the tomatoes into the funnel slowly until you have a coarse pesto. Add salt, lemon juice and cracked black pepper to taste.
Heat a tablespoon of the oil in a large pan on a medium heat and use a cutter to slice a round hole in the middle of each slice of bread.
Place the bread in the pan, spread pesto on top and crack an egg into each hole. Cook for 2-3 minutes then flip and cook until the egg is cooked to your liking.
Serve with more pesto on top and sliced avocado on the side, if desired.
